COVID-19: What Small Businesses Need to Know

td.a: What Small Businesses Need To Know

tr.td: Treasury, IRS and Labor announce plan to implement Coronavirus-related paid leave for workers and tax credits for small and midsize businesses to swiftly recover the cost of providing Coronavirus-related leave.

td.div:
Pendleton County Schools
Breakfast and Lunch

tr.td: Free breakfast and lunch for all Pendleton County students Monday-Friday, 11 AM to 12PM. Pick up at Northern and Southern Elementary. Now offering delivery services!! If your Pendleton County child needs a meal delivered, please call (859) 654-4981 by 11:30 each day. All they need is your name, address and the number of students needing a meal.
